name: CHOP AND SPLASH
description:
Made in 30 hours for Mini Jam 98

The limitation was: Make it a roguelike

Slice through enemies in this fast paced roguelike and let their blood fill the floor. You are unstoppable, and this is their worst nightmare. Good luck.

-------------------------------------------------------------

!!! There are still about 2 bugs left in the game, going to fix them as soon as I can !!!

Recommended screen size: 1920 x 1080

Download the game for the best experience.
